portfolio.title: The Runner's Friend
portfolio.description: This app exhibits the use of html and css to create a very inviting webpage easy to use for users.

portfolio.title: Weather App
portfolio.description: This weather application uses an API which allows the user to search for a city and receive a weather report for a given day/week.

portfolio.title: Employee Tracker
portfolio.description: Backend application that uses NPM, node.js, inquirer.js, and MySQL to track employees along wit htheir salaries and roles.

portfolio.title: Inventory Tracker
portfolio.description: This app was a group project that used MySQL to keep track of the name and amounts of parts in a database. A login and logout system is also in tact and allows the tracking of user soecific data.

portfolio.title: Quiz Generator
portfolio.description: This app calls an API to generate random quiz questions which then gives a score to the user after the quiz is over.

portfolio.title: Work Scheduler
portfolio.description: App that allows the user to plan out events for a given hour of the day. The present hour is marked in red, with the past hours grayed out and the future hours in green
